description: Participants lay on the ground in silence in front of the Hiroshima Peace Memorial a day before the 70th anniversary of the world’s first nuclear attack.
title: Hiroshima Marks 70 Years Since Bombing
title_page: Hiroshima Marks 70 Years Since Bombing - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Participants lay on the ground in silence in front of the Hiroshima Peace Memorial a day before the 70th anniversary of the world’s first nuclear attack.
